verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329><s%> Musician, <S%H5329><s%> A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Korah. <S%H7141><s%> Lord, <S%H3068><s%> you have been favorable <S%H7521><s%> to your land: <S%H776><s%> you have brought <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>
You have forgiven <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of your people, <S%H5971><s%> you have covered <S%H3680><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their sin. <S%H2403><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
You have taken <S%H5375><s%> away all <S%H3605><s%> your wrath: <S%H5678><s%> you have turned <S%H7725><s%> yourself from the fierceness <S%H2740><s%> of your anger. <S%H639><s%>
Turn <S%H7725><s%> us, O God <S%H430><s%> of our salvation, <S%H3468><s%> and cause your anger <S%H3708><s%> toward <S%H5973><s%> us to cease. <S%H6565><s%>
Will you be angry <S%H599><s%> with us for ever? <S%H5769><s%> will you draw <S%H4900><s%> out your anger <S%H639><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> generations? <S%H1755><s%>
Will you not revive <S%H2421><s%> us again: <S%H7725><s%> that your people <S%H5971><s%> may rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in you?
Show <S%H7200><s%> us your mercy, <S%H2617><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and grant <S%H5414><s%> us your salvation. <S%H3468><s%>

I will hear <S%H8085><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> God <S%H410><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will speak: <S%H1696><s%> for he will speak <S%H1696><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> to his people, <S%H5971><s%> and to his saints: <S%H2623><s%> but let them not turn <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> to folly. <S%H3690><s%>
Surely <S%H389><s%> his salvation <S%H3468><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him; that glory <S%H3519><s%> may dwell <S%H7931><s%> in our land. <S%H776><s%>
Mercy <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> are met <S%H6298><s%> together; righteousness <S%H6664><s%> and peace <S%H7965><s%> have kissed <S%H5401><s%> each other.
Truth <S%H571><s%> shall spring <S%H6779><s%> out of the earth; <S%H776><s%> and righteousness <S%H6664><s%> shall look <S%H8259><s%> down from heaven. <S%H8064><s%>
Yes, <S%H1571><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall give <S%H5414><s%> that which is good; <S%H2896><s%> and our land <S%H776><s%> shall yield <S%H5414><s%> her increase. <S%H2981><s%>
Righteousness <S%H6664><s%> shall go <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him; and shall set <S%H7760><s%> us in the way <S%H1870><s%> of his steps. <S%H6471><s%>
